Talk1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>With that, it's time for me to go.<sp:5:1:0>
I hope we meet on the battlefield
again someday.
Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You came to our aid again! I'm so happy
and also incredibly grateful.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>As you can see, we're in the midst of
preparing to attack the monsters who've
dug in up ahead. They must be wiped out!
Just like last time, <clr:0000>we'll approach<clr:ffff> the
fiends' stronghold first, then <clr:0000>launch our
attack <clr:ffff>when the moment is right.
If you're so inclined, Link, perhaps we can
fight together once again and drive out
those hideous monsters!
Talk1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You came to our aid once again! I'm so
happy and beyond grateful.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>But, well, it looks like the fight is
already over.

It's so strange, I was sure there was
going to be a terrible horde of monsters
here at Akkala Span.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>I can't thank you enough for doing so
much on our behalf!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sometimes it feels like you're the real
monster-control crew. I am sorry if this
has been a burden for you.
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You came to our aid again! I'm so happy
and also incredibly grateful.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>You probably noticed that we're in the
middle of a mission.

As leader of this squad, it pains me that
I have to stay here and prepare a backup
plan rather than join the fight.
Link, if you could assist my squad, I'm
certain it would raise their morale.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>Please, join this fight. Help us drive out
those repulsive monsters!
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>Once again you showed up out of
nowhere and helped us clean up a
mess of monsters.
In fact, you did most of the work, so I'm
especially grateful.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Well, well! If it isn't Link! <sp:5:1:0>Have you come
to fight beside us again?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Because of the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>, the
monsters have got their claws on
the Akkala Span again.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>But if you lead the charge, Link,<sp:5:0:0> we'll
follow without hesitation, and those
vermin will tremble at the sight of us!
Please, let's join forces again and bring
peace back to this land!
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Well, well, if it isn't Link!<sp:5:0:0> You came to
fight beside us again!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>The <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> resurrected the
monsters, and now they've got their
claws on the Akkala Span once again.
My division mounted a respectable
attack against them, but we were
outmaneuvered...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I'm desperate to rescue them, but I can't
until the <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>are wiped out.
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>One day, the <clr:0000>blood moon <clr:ffff>will disappear.


But until that day comes, we must keep
fighting.<sp:5:0:0> Peace in Hyrule depends on it.

If you were to join us, Link, I'm sure we'd
be all right. But I shouldn't burden you
with that.
Talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Here, please take this token of my
appreciation for everything you've done.
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I have to thank you again for doing so
much for us!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Sometimes it seems like you're the real
monster-control crew. I am sorry if this
has been an inconvenience for you.
Talk_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>The rain should make it <clr:0000>more difficult for
the enemy to hear our footsteps<clr:ffff>. I just
wish I could fight beside you.
Talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>I'm thinking of giving the team a bit of
a break.

The <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>... I'm sure you've
noticed it.

When the sky turns crimson, the monsters
rise up from the depths of the underworld.

We should all rest when we can so
we have the energy to fight these
endless battles.
Link, if you were by our side, I'm sure
we'd be safe... But I probably shouldn't
burden you like that.
Talk_027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Watch out for the <clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>. I recommend 
you remove all <clr:0000>metal equipment<clr:ffff>. It's safer
that way.
Talk_028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Ah, Link! <sp:5:0:0>Good thing you were here!
Once again, I'm grateful for your help.

If you don't mind, could I have a moment
of your time?
PosterMessage_Akkare:
On a mission to remove monsters from
nearby <clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff>. -Captain Toren,
Monster-Control Crew, Squad Two
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Speaking of which, I received word
from headquarters.<sp:0:4:0>It seems we're not the only squad of the
monster-control crew you've saved, Link.

I'm pleased to deliver this gift from
headquarters as a sign of our gratitude.
I hope it adds some color to your travels.
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>It looks like the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> has
resurrected the monsters on the
Akkala Span.
We must reclaim the bridge as quickly
as possible. We owe it to the people.
They're terrified.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>The monster-control crew will mount an
all-out <clr:0000>attack <clr:ffff>on the beasts once we're
able to <clr:0000>move in<clr:ffff> on this side of the bridge.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>We must bring peace back to the Akkala
region.<sp:5:0:0> Any help you can give us will be
most welcome, Link!
Talk1051:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You came to our aid once again! I'm so
happy and also incredibly grateful.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>But I hate to say it...<sp:5:1:0>you're too late.<sp:0:4:0>My squad fought bravely only to have the
monsters turn the tables on them.

I'm desperate to aid my compatriots but
can't risk being taken down myself.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>If only <clr:0000>the monsters could be defeated<clr:ffff>
somehow...
Talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:1:3:4:6e000000>May the Goddess Hylia always protect
you, brave swordsman!
